properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description:
Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.
The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.
This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...

A charming and compact one-bedroom flat located in the heart of Camden. Perfect for a first-time buyer or investor. The property features a bright open-plan living area with large sash windows, a modern kitchenette, and a renovated bathroom with a walk-in shower. Situated moments from the famous Camden Market and Regent's Canal, with excellent transport links via Camden Town Underground station (Northern Line).

An exceptional five-bedroom detached residence in one of Chelsea's most sought-after streets. This luxurious home offers over 3,000 sq ft of living space, including a grand entrance hall, a formal drawing room, a state-of-the-art chef's kitchen, and a landscaped rear garden. The master suite occupies the entire first floor, featuring a dressing room and en-suite marble bathroom. Includes off-street parking for two cars.

A delightful Victorian terraced house offering a blend of period character and modern comfort. Features include original fireplaces, high ceilings, and exposed brickwork. The ground floor comprises a double reception room leading to a spacious dining area and extended kitchen. Upstairs are three well-proportioned bedrooms and a family bathroom. Located near the vibrant Bermondsey Street and London Bridge station.

Stunning 2-bedroom penthouse apartment offering panoramic views of the Thames and the City skyline. This contemporary property features floor-to-ceiling windows, a wrap-around balcony, and a high-spec kitchen with island. Residents enjoy access to a private gym, swimming pool, and 24-hour concierge service. Ideally located for Canary Wharf business district and Jubilee Line connections.

A rare opportunity to acquire a well-maintained two-bedroom bungalow in a quiet cul-de-sac. This property offers level access throughout, a bright lounge with sliding doors to the patio, and a separate garage. The garden is south-facing and low maintenance. Potential for loft conversion subject to planning permission. Close to local amenities and Bromley South station.
